text: Late for a Date () is a 1936 Soviet comedy movie directed by Mikhail Verner and og Sergei Sidelyov.Девушка спешит на свиданиеДЕВУШКА СПЕШИТ НА СВИДАНИЕ It stars Boris Petker, Mikhail Rostovtsev, and Mariya Barabanova. ==Actors== *Boris Petker - Professor Fyodorov *Mikhail Rostovtsev - Gurov *Mariya Barabanova - mail delivery girl *Vera Streshneva - Gurov's wife *E. Pluta - Fyodorov's wife, Vera *Alexander Beniaminov - telegraphist == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1936 movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Late for a Date
